Title: Light Sleeper
Plot: Allison's recent habit of sleepwalking keeps landing her in dangerous situations.  This leaves her exhausted while she hurries to solve a kidnapping case before it's too late.
GuestStars: Seth T. Walker, James Frain, Alicia Coppola, Logan Parker Grove, Treva Etienne, Michael Kopelow, Laurel Marlantes, Anjul Nigam, Ryan Carlberg, Ron Perkins, Holliston Coleman, Greg Cahill
